CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Research & Development relative to Operations Staff?
SRP.A: Research & Development is {below} Operations Staff in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Management Team relative to Operations Staff?
SRP.A: Management Team is {above} Operations Staff in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Research & Development relative to Management Team?
SRP.A: Research & Development is {below} Management Team in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total productivity rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Research & Development}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total productivity rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Management Team}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Management Team's maximum Productivity Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Management Team's maximum Productivity Rate is in {1965}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Engineering Department's minimum Productivity Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Engineering Department's minimum Productivity Rate is in {1968}.

NC.Q: Was the total Productivity Rate in 1973 higher or lower than in 1974?
NC.A: The total productivity rate in 1973 was {higher} than in 1974.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1973, was the average total Productivity Rate higher or lower than between 1966 and 1975?
NC.A: The average total productivity rate between 1967 and 1973 was {higher} than between 1966 and 1975.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1976, was the average total Productivity Rate higher or lower than between 1972 and 1975?
NC.A: The average total productivity rate between 1974 and 1976 was {lower} than between 1972 and 1975.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1973, was the average total Productivity Rate higher or lower than between 1974 and 1976?
NC.A: The average total productivity rate between 1970 and 1973 was {higher} than between 1974 and 1976.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Research & Development} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Engineering Department and Management Team first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Engineering Department and Management Team first exchanged leading positions in {1968}.
